account.descriptionLink:
Reason for proposal:

1) In the DAO we want to foster a place where value added is one key metric to success.

2)  Healthy competition can make it fun for all to take a shot at the prize.

Proposal:

All clients (that pay for a feedback package) must agree to provide their feedback on the top 3 best points they received for us to accept the job.

Based on the clients rating, we 

a) award the highest rated feedback with one (1) whitelist token. 

b) celebrate all 3 top points in the following DAO call to learn and get better.
account.name: Reward best client rated feedback with a whitelist token going forward

account.descriptionLink:
Now that we have added the link to offer NFT purchase as a way to become one of us, we need a reasonable cost for this to be an option. The lowest cost is 20 SOL.

Recommend we mint one NFT and list it for 5 SOL on Tensor. If it sells the DAO makes 4 SOL.

If it does not sell, we can always offer it for 1 SOL to any member and only be out the transaction fees. 

Essentially there is minimal risk here and we offer a pathway for membership at a fair cost (with a slight premium for the NFT).

A vote yes sends 1.01 SOL and 1 Whitelist token to a dedicated wallet to facilitate the process.
account.name: Mint one NFT for listing on Tensor as a membership pathway
